body_html:
Is the language used by Stan not "a proper modeling language, with structure exposed to the user?"

Obviously it's not perfect by any stretch, and could benefit from a lot of tweaking especially for variable types and manipulation simplifications, but the structure seems correct, at least in theory. (Are there other drawbacks that are more fundamental?)

body:
Is the language used by Stan not "a proper modeling language, with structure exposed to the user?"

Obviously it's not perfect by any stretch, and could benefit from a lot of tweaking especially for variable types and manipulation simplifications, but the structure seems correct, at least in theory. (Are there other drawbacks that are more fundamental?)
